org.apache.flink.graph.asm.translate

接口 TranslateFunction<T,O>

  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the input elements.
    O - Type of the returned elements.
    所有超级接口:
    Function, java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    GraphKeyTypeTransform.DoubleToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.DoubleValueToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToChar, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToCharValue, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToDouble, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToDoubleValue, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToLong, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToString, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToUnsignedByte, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToUnsignedByteValue, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToUnsignedFloat, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToUnsignedFloatValue, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToUnsignedInt, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToUnsignedShort, GraphKeyTypeTransform.LongValueToUnsignedShortValue, GraphKeyTypeTransform.StringToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.StringValueToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedByteToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedByteValueToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedFloatToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedFloatValueToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedIntToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedIntValueToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedShortToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphKeyTypeTransform.UnsignedShortValueToLongValueWithProperHashCode, GraphUtils.MapTo, LongToLongValue, LongValueAddOffset, LongValueToSignedIntValue, LongValueToStringValue, LongValueToUnsignedIntValue, RichTranslateFunction, ToNullValue

    public interface TranslateFunction<T,O>
extends Function, java.io.Serializable
    Base interface for Translate functions. Translate functions take elements and transform them, element wise. A Translate function always produces a single result element for each input element. Typical applications are transcribing between data types or manipulating element values.

    Translate functions are used within the Graph API and by translating GraphAlgorithms.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      O translate(T value, O reuse)
      The translating method.

    • 方法详细资料

      • translate

        O translate(T value,
            O reuse)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        The translating method. Takes an element from the input data set and transforms it into exactly one element.
        参数:
        value - input value.
        reuse - value which may be reused for output; if reuse is null then a new output object must be instantiated and returned
        返回:
        the transformed value
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation to fail and may trigger recovery.
